title: Michael Holford
text: Michael Oliver Holford (born 11 August 1982 in <a href="Leicester">Leicester</a>, <a href="Leicestershire">Leicestershire</a>, <a href="England">England</a>) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Nottingham%20R.F.C.">Nottingham</a> in the <a href="RFU%20Championship">Aviva Championship</a>. He previously played for <a href="Leicester%20Tigers">Leicester Tigers</a>, 52 games, (where he also represented England at U19s and U21s) and <a href="Wasps%20RFC">London Wasps</a> in the <a href="English%20Premiership%20%28rugby%20union%29">Premiership</a>. His usual position is at <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a>.
